remarks: Functionality and domain of a sequence shifted by ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
statement:
shftfval.1 $e |- F e. _V $.
shftfn $p |- ( ( F Fn B /\ A e. CC ) -> ( F shift A ) Fn { x e. CC | ( x - A ) e. B } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
